title: Transmedia Storytelling-Based Mathematics Learning Design in Informal Educational Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Storytelling approach utilizing diverse media platforms to improve practical math skills for working adults

learning_goals: Learners explain foundational math concepts needed to solve real-life problems using transmedia content (images, short videos, quiz apps)
Learners collaboratively conduct math problem-solving projects with peers using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners create portfolios explaining mathematical principles using diverse media formats (infographics, storytelling videos, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
